item.title: Whats wrong with this command?
item.dc:creator: @Chemical_Reaction Chemical Reaction
item.description:
@Chemical_Reaction wrote:

Replace that code with

                            else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("notfunny")){ 
                            setAnimation(861);    
                            txt4 = "Not funny"; 
                            sendMessage("Te-he");
                            string4UpdateRequired = true; 
                            RemoveAllWindows();  
                        }

Il add it to my server and see if it works as well
Although i think changing it with tabs won’t really work but try…

item.title: Whats wrong with this command?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

I made a command, with an emote and txt4… yet neither the txt4 or emote show … heres the command

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("notfunny")){ pEmote = 861; sendMessage("Te-he"); txt4 = "Not funny"; string4UpdateRequired = true; }
